item.title: Dependency Hell
item.description: Why is the CI/CD project blocked? Because my server I was running things on broke, and I’m left with a year-old laptop.

item.title: MediaWiki Docker[part two]
item.description: This is part two of my Media Wiki documenation[0]. It has been a while since I’ve looked at this matter, but I planed it to progrss for this.

item.title: TTRSS to Docker[Part two]
item.description: In the previous post we got a TinyTiny-RSS Feedreader running in a docker environment.

item.title: TTRSS to Docker
item.description: Some time ago I wrote about the TinyTiny RSS. I did shutdown the service in 2017 because the server it was running got de-provisioned.

item.title: Docker build does not build or very slow
item.description: When you’re running a docker build command and it takes forever to build, you might have to check for the context of your buildfile.
